data.message: ogundeji is a world class prophet because he made it clearly known in today night vigil that biola,bimbo and iya ife are carrying the mark of satan in their body by asking us to hold hand in three.i also realise today that shade whom some people claim to be friday wife (olope) is a daughter to ogundeji but how can shade follow to my house because i love her,ogundeji pls help me talk to your daughter because i have already try my best
